gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 142, Trail Blazers 82
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Blazers, 142-82. Thomas Bryant totaled a season-high 26 points with 12 rebounds as Terry Rozier (22 points, six assists) and Bam Adebayo (20 points, 12 rebounds, nine assists) totaled 42 points. Scoot Henderson led Portland with 20 points, seven rebounds, and six assists.
